short_summary: Rehabilitation of Rogers Pass Discovery Centre
description: Rehabilitation du Centre de la Découverte du Col-Rogers
full_summary:
### Rogers Pass Discovery Centre Rehabilitation

#### Solicitation Number
5P468-23-0044/A

#### Issuing Department/Agency
Parks Canada

#### Date of Issue
2023-06-08

#### Closing Date and Time
2023-07-13T16:00:00

#### Purpose
The objective of this project is to rectify the structural and building envelope issues at the Rogers Pass Discovery Centre to provide a safe and functional visitor experience. The Centre is located in Rogers Pass National Historic Site, British Columbia, and is a major renovation by the Agency.

#### Selection Process
This is the second stage of a two-stage solicitation process. The first stage evaluated the qualifications of interested suppliers, and the second stage invites qualified suppliers to provide further qualifications and a financial bid on the project based on specifications and drawings.

##### Invitation Only
This solicitation is by invitation only to qualified suppliers who have been invited to bid.

#### Specifications and Requirements
The Area of Performance is the Rogers Pass Discovery Centre in Mount Revelstoke and Glacier National Parks, British Columbia. The Services to be procured under this contract include rehabilitation and rectification of structural and building envelope issues, adhering to federal mandates and directives regarding sustainable development, accessibility, sanitary facilities, and aesthetics.

#### Notice and Delivery
This solicitation was published onimat 2023-06-08, and the tender closing date and time is 2023-07-13T16:00:00. Deliverables will be met as per the project schedule.

#### Contact Information
If further information is required, please contact Kenneth Lacanilao at kenneth.lacanilao@pc.gc.ca, (587) 832-1894

#### Trade Agreements
This solicitation falls under the following trade agreements:
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement. Magento
